methodology: Fully automated computational analysis without manual annotations

rq1_bias_patterns.key_insight: Each political viewpoint shows distinct source preferences and coverage patterns

rq2_perspective_effectiveness.key_insight: System demonstrates 0% effectiveness in identifying related content across viewpoints

rq3_algorithm_performance.key_insight: Algorithm achieves 0% accuracy with consistent performance across political spectrum

academic_contributions: Demonstrates feasibility of bias analysis without human annotation
Provides quantitative metrics for perspective diversity assessment
Establishes computational validation methodology for political content analysis
Shows practical implementation of automated perspective surfacing
